title: What do students study in an information technology course? - Quora

response.answer_text: The syllabus is the same as computer science course the.there is only few difference like in information technology you don't need to study theory of computation (TOC) subject or not need to go deeper in hardware part. you will learn the basics of computers Like input, output, network, memory, MS-Office, operating system, data, CPU, Functionality of computer etc.you will learn programing language like c,c++, java or maybe python.you learn about computer network .database, data whare house, database management system, and database language SQL.different operating systems Like windows, Linux and few commands also.YOU will also learn about different kind of Microprocessor.Computer graphics .data Structureoperating System and system programming .computer Architecture etc.these are the common subject in IT and computer science . you need to study these subjects in the beginning of the course .after that you have to choose a specialization subject with your choice you can choose subjects by your choice in given options.
Mostly computer languages and HTML page development
